name: The Fabulous Artemis
description:
GOAL: Collect as many rings as you can within 3 levels.

CONTROLS: WASD

This Sailor Moon inspired mini-game is my first solo dev project. With help for audio and music creation, everything else was created from scratch.

As I embark on larger projects, "The Fabulous Artemis" gave me opportunity and deadlines to better understand what it takes to create a game in a week.

Special thanks to the Official Unity and Blender NPR discord servers for helping me along the way.

-- Credits --

Created by: Nathan Garduno

SFX: Sean McFerran

Song : Building Bridges [Royalty Free]
Music provided and produced by LonePeakMusic Video Link : https://youtu.be/4bgQFJTSlAY
